channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-3107|2024-09-17T00:12:01.115Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- experience%20manager
item.description: Adobe Experience Manager 6.3 and earlier has a misconfiguration vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-11278|2024-09-17T00:16:29.047Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- digital%20editions
item.description: Adobe Digital Editions 4.5.4 and earlier has an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-3119|2024-09-17T01:10:59.828Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- acrobat%20reader
item.description: Adobe Acrobat Reader 2017.009.20058 and earlier, 2017.008.30051 and earlier, 2015.006.30306 and earlier, and 11.0.20 and earlier has an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability in Acrobat/Reader 11.0.19 engine. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-11224|2024-09-17T00:55:52.699Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- acrobat%20reader
item.description: Adobe Acrobat Reader 2017.009.20058 and earlier, 2017.008.30051 and earlier, 2015.006.30306 and earlier, and 11.0.20 and earlier has an exploitable use after free vulnerability in the XFA layout engine. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-11238|2024-09-17T00:55:50.336Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- acrobat%20reader
item.description: Adobe Acrobat Reader 2017.009.20058 and earlier, 2017.008.30051 and earlier, 2015.006.30306 and earlier, and 11.0.20 and earlier has an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability in the image conversion engine when processing Enhanced Metafile Format (EMF) data related to curve drawing. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
